name: perform_search
description: Perform a search by typing a query or using voice search.
parameters: {'search_query': 'What do you want to search for?', 'use_voice_search': 'Do you want to use voice search instead of typing?'}

name: navigate_to_website
description: Navigate to a specific website from the list of suggested sites.
parameters: {'website_name': 'Which website do you want to navigate to? ["百度一下", "YouTube", "虎扑", "Facebook", "GitHub", "维基百科", "V2EX", "百度知道"]'}

name: open_discover_options
description: Open additional options for the Discover section.

name: switch_or_close_tabs
description: Switch between open tabs or close a tab.

name: open_more_options
description: Open more options from the toolbar.

name: go_home
description: Navigate back to the home screen.

name: open_file_manager
description: Open the file manager application to access files and folders on the device.
